tool_description: Generates customizable reminder rules and notification settings for prayer schedules.

reminder_intervals.description: Minutes before prayer time to send reminders (e.g., [15, 5])

notification_method.description: Reminder delivery method: push, email, sms, sound, all

reminder_tone.description: Tone of reminder messages: gentle, encouraging, formal, spiritual

quiet_hours_start.description: Start of quiet hours in HH:MM format

quiet_hours_end.description: End of quiet hours in HH:MM format

error_messages: Invalid reminder interval: All intervals must be positive integers under 120 minutes
Invalid notification method: Use one of [push, email, sms, sound, all]
Invalid reminder tone: Use one of [gentle, encouraging, formal, spiritual]
Invalid quiet hours format: Use HH:MM format for quiet hours
Invalid quiet hours range: Start time must be before end time
usage: Specify reminder intervals and notification method. Optionally set reminder tone, preparation time inclusion, and quiet hours. Returns configured reminder rules.

rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the reminder rule set

active_reminders.description: Array of active reminder intervals in minutes
